Name: Knights of the Tiny Table
About the game: King Arthur and his Knights have taken up arms against the evil enemies of the realm. Every battle is a randomly generated challenge that will test your smarts and luck. Winning battles will fill the war chest of Camelot, losing them will impact King Arthur's health. Key Features: Dice-based tactics : Roll the dice and deploy Knights to defeat the enemies, through a combination of strategy and luck. Arthurian heroes : Each Knight has his own attack pattern. Use their advantages to solve the tactical puzzles. Procedural score attack : Win as many randomly generated battles as efficently as possible to set the highest score.
